name: mobx-input
description: Form library for MobX, with observable state and validations

scripts.test: npm run quick-build && npm run tape
scripts.full-test: npm run small-build && npm run build-tests && npm run use-minified && npm run tape && npm run perf
scripts.perf: npm run small-build && time node --expose-gc test/perf/index.js
scripts.test-browser-electron: npm run small-build && ( browserify test/*.js | tape-run )
scripts.test-browser-chrome: npm run small-build && ( browserify test/*.js | tape-run --browser chrome )
scripts.test-browser-safari: npm run small-build && ( browserify test/*.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | tape-run --browser safari )
scripts.test-browser-firefox: npm run small-build && ( browserify test/*.js  | tape-run --browser firefox )
scripts.test-travis: npm run small-build && tape test/*.js test/perf/index.js && tsc && istanbul cover tape test/*.js
scripts.coverage: npm run small-build && npm run build-tests && istanbul cover tape test/*.js test/perf/index.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info|coveralls
scripts.build-tests: npm run build-typescript-tests && npm run build-babel-tests
scripts.lint: tslint -c tslint.json src/*.ts src/types/*.ts src/api/*.ts src/core/*.ts src/utils/*.ts

author: Tomas Holas
